member.name: T:Bunifu.UI.WinForms.BunifuPages
member.summary: Provides controlled tab-based navigation which appears invisible to users but visible and customizable to developers, thus mimicking single-page-applications design.

member.name: M:Bunifu.UI.WinForms.BunifuPages.#ctor
member.summary: Provides controlled tab-based navigation which appears invisible to users but visible and customizable to developers, thus mimicking single-page-applications design.

member.name: M:Bunifu.UI.WinForms.BunifuPages.SetPage(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the tab page that will be visible to the user.
member.param: The title of the tab page to set.
If set to true, the tab page name will be used instead of the page title when selecting; else, the default page title will be used by default.

member.name: M:Bunifu.UI.WinForms.BunifuPages.SetPage(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the tab page that will be visible to the user.
member.param: The tab page index to be set.

member.name: M:Bunifu.UI.WinForms.BunifuPages.SetPage(System.Windows.Forms.TabPage)
member.summary: Sets the tab page that will be visible to the user.
member.param: The tab page to be set.
